title: DOJ Where Art Thou? Strange Grammys… 4.05.22
itunes:title: DOJ Where Art Thou? Strange Grammys… 4.05.22
description:
In episode 1219, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian Jono Zalay to discuss…Biden to DOJ- tf is goin on over there?, Meanwhile Trump has just sat and watched Truth Social just turn into a total shitshow, Grammys were…strange, Some stuff you SHOULDN’T store on the fridge door? And more!

  1. Biden to DOJ- tf is goin on over there?
  2. Meanwhile Trump has just sat and watched Truth Social just turn into a total shitshow
  3. Some stuff you SHOULDN’T store on the fridge door?

Jono's Album - Midnight Oil: bible.recipes

LISTEN: Siesta/Wake Up!!! That's What I Said by Billy Cobham

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
